metadata.title: History of Artificial Intelligence
metadata.description: A comprehensive journey through AI evolution from the 1940s to today
metadata.targetAudience: Technical professionals with basic programming knowledge

eras.name: Foundations (1940s-1960s)
eras.description: The birth of computing and first ideas about machine intelligence

eras.name: AI Winter & Expert Systems (1970s-1980s)
eras.description: Funding cuts, renewed optimism, and knowledge-based systems

eras.name: Deep Learning Revolution (2010s)
eras.description: Neural networks finally deliver on their promise

eras.name: Modern AI (2020s)
eras.description: Large language models and the age of generative AI
